title: Gold 2/3 ADC looking clash team on silver smurf.
body:
Main IGN: Problem

Smurf IGN: Pupppy

Using this smurf account to learn hypercarry adcs (I am accustomed to cait/tristana).

Ill be online at 7:15PM AEST, I'll accept all friend requests and we can quickly discuss. Not too fussed about how good/bad ranks are.

I can hop onto main if needed to prove
